data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Kalmar awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 6, Kalmar to take a throw-in in Norrkoping territory.
Throw-in for Kalmar close to the penalty box.
In Kalmar a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 10, Corner awarded to Kalmar.
Norrkoping needs to be cautious. Kalmar have an attacking throw-in.
Ball safe as Norrkoping is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 12, Throw-in for Norrkoping at Guldfageln Arena.
Throw-in for Norrkoping in their own half.
Glenn Nyberg signals a Kalmar throw-in in Norrkoping's half.
In the minute 15, Norrkoping push upfield and Isak Bergmann Johanneson gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Kalmar defence.
Free kick Kalmar.
Free kick for Norrkoping in their own half.
In the minute 17, Glenn Nyberg signals a free kick to Kalmar in their own half.
Glenn Nyberg awards the away team a throw-in.
Norrkoping drives forward and Jonathan Levi gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 20, Glenn Nyberg signals a free kick to Norrkoping.
Jonathan Levi for Norrkoping drives towards goal at Guldfageln Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Norrkoping have been awarded a corner by Glenn Nyberg.
In the minute 21, Norrkoping's Rasmus Lauritsen goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Norrkoping have been awarded a corner by Glenn Nyberg.
Free kick for Norrkoping in the half of Kalmar.
In the minute 27, Throw-in Kalmar.
Goal! A Isak Bergmann Johanneson header gives Norrkoping a 0-1 lead in Kalmar.
Jonathan Levi with an assist there.
In the minute 30, Ball goes out of play for a Norrkoping goal kick.
Ball safe as Kalmar is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Kalmar are coming forward and Sebastian Ring gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 31, It's a goal kick for the away team in Kalmar.
In Kalmar a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Norrkoping awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 33, Throw-in for Kalmar in the half of Norrkoping.
Goal kick for Norrkoping at Guldfageln Arena.
Throw-in for Norrkoping at Guldfageln Arena.
In the minute 35, Can Kalmar get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Norrkoping's half?
Norrkoping drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 37, Glenn Nyberg signals a throw-in for Kalmar, close to Norrkoping's area.
Norrkoping move into a more comfortable 0-2 lead. Christoffer Nyman is the scorer with a header!
Great play from Alexander Fransson to set up the goal.
In the minute 39, Glenn Nyberg signals a free kick to Kalmar.
Kalmar have a goal kick.
Kalmar awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 41, Norrkoping's Christoffer Nyman misses with an attempt on goal.
Glenn Nyberg awards Kalmar a goal kick.
Kalmar have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 41, Norrkoping awarded a free kick in their own half.
Glenn Nyberg awards the home team a throw-in.
Norrkoping push forward at Guldfageln Arena and Simon Thern gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Kalmar defence.
In the minute 45, Christoffer Nyman of Norrkoping gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Kalmar goal kick.
Throw-in Norrkoping.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Free kick Kalmar.
Nanne Bergstrand is making the team's first substitution at Guldfageln Arena with Mayron George replacing Filip Sachpekidis.
In the minute 46, Alexander Ahl Holmstrom is on a sub for Edvin Crona for Kalmar.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Alexander Ahl Holmstrom.
In the minute 46, Eric Smith is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Free kick for Norrkoping in their own half.
Throw-in for Kalmar in their own half.
In the minute 48, Kalmar's Alexander Ahl Holmstrom is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Kalmar.
Glenn Nyberg signals a free kick to Norrkoping in their own half.
In the minute 48, Alexander Ahl Holmstrom is back on the pitch.
Eric Smith has recovered and rejoins the match in Kalmar.
In the minute 50, Throw-in Kalmar.
Jens Gustafsson (Norrkoping) is making a first substitution, with Egzon Binaku replacing Rasmus Lauritsen.
Throw-in for Norrkoping in their own half.
Mayron George of Kalmar smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 52, Norrkoping have a goal kick.
Glenn Nyberg signals a free kick to Norrkoping.
Viktor Elm (Kalmar) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 54, Free kick for Kalmar in their own half.
Important block from the Kalmar defence as Simon Thern fires in a strike for Norrkoping.
Kalmar are pushing forward but Isak Jansson's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 57, Goal kick for Norrkoping at Guldfageln Arena.
Throw-in for Kalmar at Guldfageln Arena.
Glenn Nyberg awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 59, Simon Thern gets his shot on target but fails to score for Norrkoping.
Free kick Kalmar.
Norrkoping awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 62, Ball safe as Kalmar is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Kalmar are caught offside.
Throw-in for Norrkoping at Guldfageln Arena.
In the minute 64, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kalmar.
In Kalmar a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 68, Glenn Nyberg awards Kalmar a goal kick.
Kalmar awarded a free kick in their own half.
Norrkoping's Linus Wahlqvist has been booked in Kalmar.
In the minute 70, The away team replace Christoffer Nyman with Pontus Almqvist.
Norrkoping make their third substitution with Andreas Blomqvist replacing Jonathan Levi.
Isak Pettersson is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 72, Norrkoping's Isak Pettersson is back in action after a slight knock.
Glenn Nyberg signals a Kalmar throw-in in Norrkoping's half.
Throw-in for Norrkoping in their own half.
In the minute 74, In Kalmar Norrkoping attack through Isak Bergmann Johanneson. The finish is off target, however.
Glenn Nyberg awards Kalmar a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kalmar.
In the minute 76, Glenn Nyberg signals a free kick to Kalmar in their own half.
Norrkoping awarded a free kick in their own half.
Emin Nouri is replacing Sebastian Ring for the home team.
In the minute 77, York Raphael is replacing Piotr Johansson for Kalmar at Guldfageln Arena.
Throw-in Kalmar.
Free kick for Kalmar in the half of Norrkoping.
In the minute 79, Throw-in high up the field for Kalmar in Kalmar.
Free kick for Norrkoping in their own half.
In the minute 80, Glenn Nyberg signals a free kick to Kalmar in their own half.
Isak Jansson (Kalmar) has received a yellow card from Glenn Nyberg.
Norrkoping awarded a free kick in their own half.
Andreas Blomqvist of Norrkoping gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 81, Kalmar have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Kalmar in the half of Norrkoping.
Norrkoping's Isak Bergmann Johanneson gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Kalmar defender.
In the minute 84, Kalmar have been awarded a corner by Glenn Nyberg.
Corner awarded to Kalmar.
Norrkoping's Pontus Almqvist gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 86, Goal kick for Kalmar at Guldfageln Arena.
Ball safe as Norrkoping is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ball goes out of play for a Kalmar goal kick.
In the minute 89, Kalmar to take a throw-in in Norrkoping territory.
Can Kalmar capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Norrkoping's half?
Alexander Ahl Holmstrom (Kalmar) strikes at Guldfageln Arena but his header is cleared.
Free kick for Kalmar in their own half.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Norrkoping’s Pontus Almqvist is on his feet again at Guldfageln Arena.
Free kick for Norrkoping in the half of Kalmar.
In Kalmar, Isak Bergmann Johanneson of Norrkoping is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Norrkoping are coming forward and Isak Bergmann Johanneson gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Kalmar goal kick.
Glenn Nyberg signals a throw-in for Kalmar, close to Norrkoping's area.
Free kick Norrkoping.
Kalmar awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Glenn Nyberg awards the home team a throw-in.
That's full-time at Guldfageln Arena. The final score is 0-2.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Pontus Almqvist for Norrkoping who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Attention is being given to Kalmar’s Romarinho and play has been suspended briefly.
